text: It's time to put those theoretical principles into practice. Welcome to your trading playbook. The purpose of this playbook is very simple. It's a summarized version of what of the key principles you've learnt in part 1. Make sure you keep it up to date. Answer the following questions in the playbook provided. Complete your trading mission statement. In order to do this, answer the following questions. What do you want to achieve from trading? What timeline are you giving yourself to achieve success in trading? What does success mean to you? What are your goals with this course? Then complete the steps to developing an edge in your virtual playbook. And the last question, have a look at the EURUSDFX daily chart provided. subject of opinion-based points in the right column. Good luck and see you in part two.
